name: Viral (itch) (MachaMojo)
description:
You find yourself in a new and strange place, where giant red and white cells lazily drift by on an ever-flowing current. It's a MASSIVE place to be sure, where every area seems to serve a different function for a greater goal. In a world as grandiose as this, what's the first thing you do? Why, to find the nearest cell and turn it into a factory for yourself, of course! You are a virus, and you will not stop until this world serves only to make more of YOU!

This game was made using Unreal Engine 4, by someone who learned the program pretty much as he went. Donations aren't needed for something like this, so if you love/hate the game, donate in the form of constructive criticism in the comments section of this page. That dude's pretty darn new here, so any feedback for him is good feedback!

Features:
  • "Bullet-hell" style gameplay
  • 10 levels, each with a unique new part of the body to infect
  • Scientifically inaccurate T Cells
  • A non-zero amount of lasers
  • Occasional horror elements
Credits:

Game By: Alexander Machalicky

...that's it.
